Description: A miner's first best friend! Place this down to start making money.
A steaming hot furnace. Drop some ore into it to make some money!
Basic part used to move ores from droppers and other machines to furnaces. The Conveyor is a key part of every factory.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
A very shiny mine that produces very shiny crystals.
A high-temperature furnace which processes ores at triple their value.
A professional doesn't let any of their precious ore go to waste, and neither does this conveyor.
Nothing like a massive steel wall to keep bad guys out of your base.
Some people prefer the look of fine-polished wooden planks on their walls. That's fine too.
A massive wall made out of bricks. Great for defending your base.
This item has been retired.
A massive furnace that harnesses the power of other dimensions to quadruple the value of processed ores. Gives 3 Points per 100 ore.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
They say some things are worth their weight in gold. especially gold!
Darkness is no good! This bright light turns on at night time and illuminates your factory!
A friend of berezaa's, Aman stands in place and is always looking around at your stuff.... watching.
Platinum is like gold, except shinier and the mine glows for some reason.
Silver ore is worth more than Iron and is mined much quicker.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
A flat-rate upgrader that can be used to increase the value of your ores.
Use this upgrader several times in a row to quickly upgrade your ores. Only effective on cheap ore.
A tiny upgrader that only covers part of the conveyor. Any ore that passes through gets a big upgrade.
A small machine that quadruples the value of every tenth ore that passes through.
A high-tech machine that constantly attempts to scan ore. Scanned ore gets 150% added to value. An ore can only be scanned once.
A machine that produces coal. Coal is worth $0 when put into a furnace but is used to power many heavy machines.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
Now you've made it to the big league. Diamonds are small but very expensive.
A giant machine that spits out super valuable ruby every time it is fueled with a coal ore.
A 3x2 conveyor as opposed to a 2x2 that can hold much bigger loads
Allows a wide conveyor to convert to a regular conveyor.
A small raised conveyor that allows loads to be dumped onto lower conveyors.
Uranium may be highly radioactive and generally unsafe, but boy does it make good money on the open market.
A military-made conveyor belt that moves ores at twice the speed of normal conveyors.
A soda machine full of yummy Dr Berza soda. Not for human consumption!
Super cheap but weak torches that automatically light at night-time, keeping your base bright all night!
A massive wall made out of rusty metal. Looks pretty cool.
A massive and well-looking wall made out of nice granite stone.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
A shielded conveyor helps ensure you don't accidently drop any ore.
A conveyor ramp allows you to raise ore from one conveyor belt and drop it onto another one. A very useful piece.
This mine produces a burst of valuable copper every now and then.
a massive furnace that multiplies the value of ore by six. Gives 4 Points per 100 ore.
A towering mine that drops massive ore which are worth tons of money.
Applies huge upgrades, however the ore becomes radioactive and has to hit a furnace in 6 seconds or it will explode!
A heavy conveyor which grants ore a small upgrader before launching it forward into the air.
A massive upgrader that unlocks an ore's true power by quintupling its value. Only affects ore that hasn't been upgraded yet.
Super advanced technology that teleports ore to a receiver. If more than 1 receiver is down, it will pick one at random. REQUIRES A RECEIVER TELEPORTER.
A wide conveyor that teleported ore appears at. Requires a sender teleporter to work. If there is more than one receiver, teleports will pick them at random.
An explosive machine that allows you to manually destroy all ore that you own. Useful for getting rid of clogged or escaped ore.
Pure research-grade plutonium. Don't tell the government about this.
Shiny opals apparently come from meteorites. They certainly fetch a fortune.
An advanced and quick conveyor that projectst tall shields to prevent any ore from escaping.
A high-energy conveyor that moves ores incredibly fast. Takes up more space than normal conveyors.
With all your expensive machines and money, its important to remember mother nature.
One of the greatest mysteries of life, the Autumn Tree is extremely expensive to make and is only for the rich.
The pinnacle of nature's beauty, the mysterious and all-knowing cherry blossom tree is only owned by those with great power.
A conveyor that moves ore at incredible speeds, however it takes up a ton of space.
An advanced upgrader that rapidly upgrades ore. Ore that is too large is set on fire.
When in doubt, placing a giant rock in your base is usually the right way to go.
Osmium is a tiny but extremely powerful mine. It's also really rare. Like REALLY rare.
Lots of rich people like using B ismuth in jewlery or something. Doesn't matter, you'll get rich off of it!
Sometimes you need to set back and admire your work. This bench allows you to do just that.
A special mine that produces a diamond ore every time it is activated by a remote radio.
Pumps out large opal ore when remotely activated by the radio.
A conveyor that is raised much higher than other conveyors. Can be useful for creating intersections
A conveyor that can be used with Raised-ier conveyors to create multi-level ore flow.
A conveyor piece used for seperating diffierent levels of conveyor.
An interesting piece that allows two-level conveyor systems to overlap.
A tiny yet extremely powerful upgrader built into a raised-ier conveyor.
A large converter-type ramp that is used to move ore up to a raised-ier conveyor.
An old and bulky upgrader with a very slow conveyor. Don't be fooled though, this machine packs a punch.
A slab of wood is easier on the feet than cold hard stone.
Sometimes you need some pretty carpet to decorate your base.
Oh, nature! Grass flooring is the flooring to use when you want your base to be in touch with mother nature.
Pebble is a really nice material if you're looking to make your base pretty
Light up your base with pretty glowing lava flooring. (Doesn't kill)
A teleporter that operates using diffierent technology. It can only teleport ore to a pink reciever.
A special teleporter pad that only recieves ore from pink teleporters.
A super advanced scanner that has no limits when upgrading ore, except that it can only scan an ore once.
An example of luxrious tech at its finest, this tiny upgrader hits hard. It also extinguishes any ore set on fire, preventing it from being destroyed.
Sacrifice your ore to the underworld and recieve back 10x the ores' value. Gives 5 points per 80 ore.
An evil ore purifier from the depths of the underworld, this ancient relic uses the energy of a thousand cursed souls to add $40,000 to the value of any ore that passes through, period.
Send your ores to a better place with the power of mother nature. The pretty leaves and grass will return 15x the ore's value using photosynthisis. Gives 6 Points per 80 ore.
An enhanced Large Ore Upgrader that uses solar panels to boost its conveyors and its upgrade cap to $50k.
A massive machine that spits out huge diamond ore every time it is fed a coal ore.
A compact furnace that only accepts ores directly from droppers in return for a huge bonus.
A more advanced furnace that offers a huge bonus for ore dropped directly into it.
A two-sided cell furnace that grants massive upgrades to any ore dropped directly into it.
A brilliant display of technology that produces $27,000 of osmium ore every time it is fueled by coal ore.
They say money doesn't buy happiness. Ask them if they've ever purchased a massive gold mine?
An over-hanging scanner that perfectly clones any ore that passes through
People have been killed for painite. It is simply one of the most valuable materials on the planet.
A portable device that can be clipped onto the side of a conveyor. Upgrades ore by 5% with no limit. Ore can only be upgraded 30 times by a Portable upgrader.
Coordinates with satellites that collect natural antimatter in the earth's orbit and recieves incoming antimatter packages from space.
A glowing teleporter that only sends ores to matching green recievers
A glowing teleport pad that only accepts ores from green teleporters.
Blasts ore at an obscene speed. Ore is multipled five times if it is somehow recovered.
A breath-taking statue which depicts a swordsman going to war. Comes with real swords to whack your friends with.
A polished rack set in stone. Holds auctual iron-clad revolvers.
A survival tent with toy rifles inside! Fun for scaring your friends!
A ton of crates packed with what appear to be old-fashioned shotguns and shotgun shells.
A powerful conveyor that has double the speed of a regular conveyor without restricting either side.
A machine that resembles an ore upgrader. Sends ores to another dimension to be judged. No one knows what happens to the ore and some don't come back at all.
A platform which you will be dropped down onto when you respawn. Placing more than one will select a beacon at random each time.
An old weapons cache which appears to have been left behind with live AK-47's.
A long vertical ladder used to climb up walls and other tall structures.
A thick wooden wall lined with metal stairs. Useful for getting up in style.
Quintiples the value of scanned ore. Doesn't affect ore scanned by any other scanner machine. Sets ore on fire (destroyed in 4 seconds if not put out or processed)
Cool party-styled boombox! Doesn't play any auctual music though...
A small beacon that is hooked up to a matching satellite to fire down a beam which upgrades ore up to 3 times by 40%. Attaches to conveyors.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
An underworldly cell furnace that grants unspeakable bonuses to any ore that gets dropped in.
A secure gate that allows you and any of your ROBLOX friends to enter. Completely and utterly incapicates any intruders that try to enter but does not kill them.
A heavy gate that allows the owner to open or close the door by touching colored pads.
New plasma technology allows for the technology of jump pads that send you flying into the air.
Give your ores as offerings to the gods and you will be rewarded. Rewarded with 25x the ores' value, that is. Gives 7 points for every 75 ore.
A conveyor without walls that moves ores very fast. This definitely breaks safety code.
New research has enabled the creation of flood lights with a much larger range.
Modern machinary used to produce rapid-fire automatic SMG weapons.
A powerful upgrader that only turns on at night time. Upgrades ores by 75% with no limit. Can only upgrade ores three times.
Advances in micro-technology allow for a mine that spits out 6 $2 iron ore every two seconds.
A fresh upgrader that uses the power of pineapples to increase the value of ore by 100%. Comes free with the purchase of a private island.
A special machine that increases your character's speed by 9. You can only be infused once.
Has technology gone too far? No, no it hasn't. This hacked cleaner quadruples the value of ore that enters.
Exclusive lit berezaa Games walls given only to berezaa Games group members.
RAT is the most powerful military in all of ROBLOX. With over 200,000 members, show that you are a part of an unstoppable military with this flag.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
A frozen wonder that processes flaming ore at incredible values.
A giant katana stuck in a rock. Not worth much, except for the sweet working katanas it comes with.
A fancy diamond mine with an AUCTUAL ninja sitting on it! Drops $1k worth of diamond ore every 2 seconds.
A rapidly color-changing upgrader that upgrades ore from 5 to 100% depends on the color of the upgrader. Doesn't upgrade ore worth more than $100M
An industrial mine that spits out $100 to $10k worth of ore every time coal hits it, depending on the color of the mine.
A special teleporter that teleports ores to orange teleport recievers. Requires recievers to function.
A special teleport reciever that accepts ores from yellow teleporters only.
For those who really want to put their money where their defense is: a giant wall made of diamond!
Shining walls made out of pure gold. Amazing!
The glare of the red ruby is perfect for the base of the reaaaly rich!
An interestly-shaped furnace that processes at +$100,000 and then x10 value. Does not produce Research Points. Beta tester exclusive. Accepts direct ore on two sides, conveyor ore on one side.
Mithril is a once-mythical material used to create powerful weapons and armor. It fetches a hefty price.
Money buys happiness. That is fact. This giant diamond mine proves that.
A pretty bonfire that lights itself at nighttime to illuminate your base. Shines brighter than a torch.
A pirate likes to keep their guns in the same place they keep their winnings: a table.
Transports ores to your local ship to be sold by shady pirates.
Let any would-be invaders know that you are a scary pirate and will probobly blox them very easily.
An upgrader that uses the magical power of berezaa's twitch to upgrade ores by 60%. Can only upgrade ores once.
An ancient conveyor with strange markings on the side... has very tall walls and works faster than regular conveyors.
A powerful cell furnace that prefers natural (more expensive) ore.
Who still uses regular floodlights these days? Not you, that's for sure!
Who needs green or orange trees when you can have a cool and sleek blue tree!
A stand holding real-life Warhammers, empowered by their thirst for war.
A futuristic pad that sends people flying much higher into the air than regular jump pads.
A massive super-sized torch plated in gold that lights up a massive amount of area in your base at night.
An advanced coal mine that instantly drops 3 coal ores every 4 seconds while still being the same size as a regular coal mine.
A portable device that sets ores on fire, adding $5000 to their value but destroying them in 5 seconds if they don't reach a furnace or get put out.
A machine that mass-produces the UZI, a modern rapid-fire weapon with high damage and short range.
A loyal undead minion that will attack any enemies that come within it's radius. Does not attack its owner's ROBLOX friends.
The amazing glowing neon tree is neither understood nor accepted by any conventional science. It looks amazing though.
A mysterious material that emits the most powerful earthly light known to man. Illuminates a massive amount of your base at nighttime.
The once mythical firecrystal takes so much energy to mine that this machine needs to shoot out exhaust flames.
Shaped like a cobra poised to attack, the Darkmatter mine is a scary machine that shows just how far we've come.
An upgraded suspended in mid-air that upgrades ores by 70% up to $1Qn. Did we mention it floats?!
A raised upgrader that increases the value of ore over $1T by 80% up to $50Qn.
A compact futuristic cell furnace that processes ore at 5T times its original value. Gives 8 points per 50 ore.
The dreamer is ambitious, and rightfully so. We have worlds to create. Massive upgrades for ore worth over a trillion dollars.
A modern mine that draws power from your base's unobtainium crystals. Ore comes out pre-upgraded.
Ambrosia is the mythical food of the ancient greek gods. Our scientists have found that this material is real!
A half-sized conveyor used for high-level miners to better channel their ore.
An old item which has been removed from the shop.
Every miner needs to show their educated side with a set of nice books.
With all this machinery everywhere, a little nature can brighten up your base.
A special machine that lets your character jump higher. You can only be infused once.
An advanced machine that increases your character's speed by 12. You can only be infused once.
Keep those baddies out with higher walls and cover for you to shoot at your enemies!
Oh, how delicate the mind of the dreamer is.
Submits ores into a black hole to be turned into pure energy. Gives 40x the value of the ore but costs 1 Research Point for every 30 seconds the black hole is open.
An amazing machine that removes all status effects such as Radioactive and Flaming from an ore and removes all tags, allowing it to go through limiting machines again. Can only be used once.
A scary-looking mine that produces ore worth an incalculatable amount of money. Doesn't work with cell furnaces, for some reason.
An odly-shaped upgrader that increases the value of ore by 40% up to $1sx.
Increases the value of ore by 70% up to $100sx. Removes fire from ores.
A small yet useful piece that can be placed on the side of conveyors to prevent ore from escaping.
A heavy mine which has buttons that must be clicked in order to drop large gold ore.
A larger version of the plutonium mine that produces large ore when the buttons on the back of the machine are clicked.
Only the richest people can afford a giant doge plush in their base.
An awesome glowing pink floor made out of pure unobtainium.
One of the most expensive items in the game is... a pink floodlight? AWESOME!!!
Who on earth would purchase a tree for the price of 100 crystals?? Someone who wants a tree that burns forever!
The single most expensive crystal item in the game. Anyone who steps on it gets the badge. Only works on public servers.
An advanced machine that increases your character's speed by 8 and allows you to jump higher. You can only be infused once.
A haunted machine that allows your character to jump much higher but decreases your speed. You can only be infused once.
A very big osmium mine that produces massive ore manually on click.

A spooky upgrader that educates ores. It takes 5 seconds for ores to learn to become better, gaining a x5 boost. If their education is interrupted they are destroyed. Ores can normally only be educated once.
A tall piece of wood that can be used to create walls.
A slab of metal that fills holes in walls or can be used as a pillar.
Rapidly produces osmium ore when activated by the remote radio.
Futuristic crates lined with energy to fuel brand new laser pistols. Doesn't auctually hurt people.
Our new research allows us to create plasma energy weapons that shoot with an un-matched range and accuracy!
Our new research allows us to create plasma energy weapons that shoot with an un-matched range and accuracy!
A massive rig that allows the legendary ambrosia to be manually mined.
An ancient mine that's been lost of hundreds of years. Drops ore that doubles in size after 30 seconds, quadrupling the ore's value, no matter what it is at.
A high-power gate that explodes anyone who tries to enter except the owner. Warning: the explosion can kill nearby people.
A basic turret so powerful that it must be mounted to an iron wall to operate. Deals massive damage but requires being seated.
The power of a black hole ripping apart an entire galaxy has been shrunken down into a small orb for you. Use it well.
What's more uncertain than a Schrodinger? One that's on fire!!!?!?!?!?!?!!
Aww its an adowable undead guardian!!!! I bet it would never hurt a living thing :(
The big bad blaster is easily the smallest and worst blaster in the world. It attaches to conveyors and triple the value of ore... most of the time.
An old and scary cell furnace, possibly once owned by George Washington.
I don't want to know how those orcs made this fire. It's inhuman.
An extremely hot mine that produces very valuable ore. Requires coal blocks to fuel.
Ain't no one stacking into your base with this sweet slanted wall. Ain't no one.
Keep people out of your base with all new special laser tech that kills anyone it touches.
A cursed infuser that grants +10 Speed at the cost of -25 MaxHealth. You can only be infused once.
A half-sized conveyor used for high-level miners to better channel their ore.
For when you need a giant pillar of rust in your base.
An awesome switch conveyor that accepts ore from the side and then sends it either left or right depending on the setting.
An ancient mine quite literally haunted by the ghosts of the people it's killed. No one has ever seen this mine's ore and lived to tell the tale.
A professional doesn't play games and neither does this upgrader. Upgrade ores by 30% up to 4 times.
The union of magic and pumpkin create this unique lighting source. It is very rare.
A relic from the 2015 Halloween Event, the Headless Horseman stands in your base and scares anyone who sees him.
Communicates with Spawn Beacons to allow you to spawn in with a temporary forcefield. Requires at least 1 Spawn Beacon placed.
A spook center that process ore at x3 value, granting 10 points every 30 ore. Requires ore worth at least $50k.
A relic from the 2015 halloween event. Operates like a normal security gate, only allowing the owner in.
A relic from the 2015 halloween event. Operates like a normal control gate.
Aman got a pumpkin stuck on his head! LOL! This priceless relic was given out during the 2015 Halloween Event.
Words cannot describe the pure horror that this plushie inspires. A relic from the 2015 Halloween Event.
A triple coal mine haunted by the spirits of murdered pumpkins. A relic of the 2015 Halloween Event.
A powerful upgrade with no limits and potential for high upgrades. Requires power from clicks to operate.
A scary furnace powered by crystals that seem to respond to certain radio waves. Claims ore at x45 when activated. Awards points based on state.
Those who worship the Sword God find themselves losing many battles.
A godly infuser that grants immunity to exploding zombies and gives a massive speed, jump and health boost.
A relic from the Progressive Era, Big Bertha promises a whopping x12 for any ore that get through it. Bertha doesn't like repeat customers.
Santa's workshop doesn't produce ore, it produces gifts! Some gifts freeze and turn into temporary upgraders! 2015 Holiday Event item.
An incredibly powerful upgrader that quadruples the value of ore that passes through. Can only be used once per ore.
Dubious Noobius is a very strange and even rarer creature. They have the ability to crate Noobite Mines, which make more money the richer their owners are.
Uses super advanced ore thermo-crushing technology to upgrade ores by 30% up to $10Sp
Lava suspended in the air seems to have special properties on ore. Upgrades ore by 15% up to $1O
An upgrader that harnesses micro-electronic technology to upgrade ores worth more than $1qd by 45% up to $1N
Santa deemed that 2015 was a swell year for the people around you. Santa rewarded your good behavior by gifting you his Sleigh, which doubles the value of ores once with no restrictions.
Radiation is rad. A glowing mine that applies a random amount of upgrades to its ore before it even comes out.
A well-decorated wall from the 2015 Holiday Event. Don't worry, no one will get through.
The power of pure superiority grants a significant jump boost, +30 MaxHealth and +5 Speed. Obliterate nearby enemies on death.
Doubles the chance of uncovering Lucky Clovers in crates or with kills. Increases Speed by 4. Discovered in the Gambler's Dice during the Holiday Event 2015.
A conveyor for those who like to live dangerously. Shuttles ores accross your base quickly and efficiently. Unboxed from the Shoddy Crate in the 2015 Holiday Event.
Undead Santa seeks out those who have been naughty by breaking into your base. Discovered under the Special Snowflake in the 2015 Holiday Event.
A relic from the 2015 Holiday Event, the Neon Gift of Glowing lights up to illuminate your base at night.
Advanced freon technology has allowed for the creation of a deadly freeze ray weapon. A relic from the 2015 Holiday Event.
Some awesome high-power fireworks stuck in some dirt. A relic from the 2015 New Years event.
The mistakes we made, the people we lost. We will use that pain to our advantage. Requires very expensive ore to unlock its true potential.
A highly sophisticated device that tags ore with satellite which allow you to track an ore's value.
U r dark n mysterious loomanti 3l33t. If you only have 1 particle giver placed, it will be your default particle.
What a time to be in love! If you only have 1 particle giver placed, it will be your default particle.
What can I say, you're a wealthy person! If you only have 1 particle giver placed, it will be your default particle.
Save the day, mighty superhero! If you only have 1 particle giver placed, it will be your default particle.
You are one with mother nature! If you only have 1 particle giver placed, it will be your default particle.
By far one of the best infuser machines, greatly increases your character's speed and jump without penalty. You can only infuse once per life.
Proper lighting is cool and all but so is making your base look like an evil lair.
Uses unexplainable science (basically magic) to super-size a single atom and farm it for super powerful ore
Spring is coming! Your little bee friends are buzzing about again, upgrading any ore they see by increasing and then tripling its value! Bees can only upgrade once. April 2016 exclusive.
This item has been retired.
A raised upgrader that increases the value of an ore by 25% up to three times with no cash limit.
The clockwork is a massive underground machine that's existed for thousands of years. Harness that power.
Send your ore on the final journey and hope for its return. Only one ore can be sent at a time.
An upgrader made just for Executive Miners. Greatly upgrades one ore every 5 seconds.
R.I.P. TIX 2016. Scans ore that passes through and produces a tix for every 10 ore that pass through. Tix forever!
A mysterious tear in the earth that appears to function like a cell furnace. Gives crazy returns on unupgraded ore.
A new and sleek upgrader that upgrades ore at any level several times. Requires constant coal fuel supply.
The great sage seeks ore with experience, granting higher values to ore that's been upgraded more times.
A monstrous merge of mine and machine. Promises great profits to those who can harness its unpredictable ore.
An antique split-personality furnace that looks and acts differently during the night and day.
The gate of the eclipse is guarded by the Eclipse Security Administration. Who knows what they do to your ore.
Forget unobtainium, this monster of a mine crushes through the earth for precious superunobtainium!
The gorgous Diamond Falls process ore at twenty-one times their normal value. It's also great to look at.
Dangerous and semi-legal chemicals are used to increase the value of any ore by 80%, however that ore needs to get to a furnace quick.
The legendary blade Excalibur stores the value of ores that are sacrificed to it and stacks it onto all new ores for a short time.
A high-caliber mine that still functions with cell furnaces. Ores are worth more depending on how many Twitch Coins you have.
True justice is blind. Processes lightly upgraded ore and ore that other cell furnaces normally do not accept.
For all things kappa, invests your ore into dank memes. The value of processed ores fluctuates with the market value of dat boi.
Sport your twitch fandom with this awesome fancy twitch security wall.
Applies ancient math to ore, changing their value only once in a mysterious but nonrandom way.
Removes negative status effects from ore such as fire and radiation. Ignores the effects of the Ore Illuminator. What else it does is unknown...
The staggering achievement of accruing a duodecillion dollars is now yours to show off with this upgrader.
This strange alien relic now powers a unique upgrader which seems to de-age ore.
A celebratory upgrader given out on Miner's Haven's 1st birthday! Increase ore under $1T by x2.5
A gorgous cake to celebrate Haven's first birthday. Builds up power as it is fed more ore.
The persistant scorpium mine produces greater value ores the longer it is placed down.
The great volcango burns any ores that manage to enter it at x150. July 2016 item.
Let's get the party started! Wubium's beats periodically activate remote items. July 2016 item.
Powered by stone from the legendary Azure Mines, this relic upgrades pure ore by x4.
Send your ore through the mighty Morning Star for nearly endless growth. Ignited ore must be put out or it'll be destroyed.
A statue carved out of an unknown material which radiates incredible power. There's big, there's bad, and then there's this.
The secret device that designates the unmistakablede god of this world. Doesn't stack with original Overlord Device.
The Symmetrium mine tracks its single ore and continuously upgrades it over time. It's azure flame protects the ore from being burnt. Ore is replaced instantly when destroyed.
Donates 99% of your ore's value to John Cena. Probobly the worst item in the game.
Sends a signal into time to upgrade ore some time in the future. Can only be used once.
A simple machine, removes fire from ores without tagging and sends them on their way.
Although the spirit of the once mighty Sword Master, their spirit lives on.
A sturdy upgrader with a fast conveyor that doubles the value of ore up to a decillion dollars.
This item is no longer in use and will be destroyed when you Rebirth.
A crude device which violently tears ore from other dimensions into our own.
A mighty powerful furnace which processes ores at a huge rate. Puts up a barrier between ores to recharge.
Ore that comes in contact with this furnace is wisped away into the wind. If it is returned to the furnace it'll be processed at x200.
A powerful contraption that upgrades ore by 75% up to $300M.
An advanced scanner for twitch viewers that adds $1000 to the value of an ore and then quintuples it. Doesn't work with other scanners.
A gentle breeze blows through the air, knocking down the leaves of a magical tree. Ore that comes into contact with a leaf is upgraded by 50%. Multiple leaves can stack.
The dreamer's greatest enemy is one's self. Cruel how we often fail to realize how far we've come.
Tricks furnaces into thinking an ore has been upgraded one or two times less than it actually has been. Only works once per ore.
This ain't your granddaddy's ore tracker, this bad boy is made of four thousand karat gold.
Surprise your visitors with a visit from your friend, Clowny the undead clown! A relic of the 2016 Halloween Event.
A spooky wall to show off how spooky you are. Limited-edition 2016 Halloween Event Item.

Doomed to sail the seas forever, the Flying Dutchman is said to be packed with treasures. Produces a mystery box or clover every 30 minutes if enough well-upgraded ore is sacrified. 2016 Halloween Item.
The mysterious bog doubles the value of any ore that passes through. Good luck finding your ore, though. 2016 Halloween Event item.
Hades' wrath and jealousy are unmatched. The ore from this terrifying mine will consume all it touches. 2016 Halloween Event relic.
A tribute to the hundred evil pumpkins you murdered during the 2016 Halloween Event
Send your ore to the haunted carnival for a good time! A relic of the 2016 Halloween Event
The culmination of the most evil mines in history. No one will ever understand the mysteries of this device. Obtained during the 2016 Halloween Event.
A silly pumpkin turned herself into an upgrader! Relic of the 2016 Halloween Event!
There's just something EVIL about this tree... 2016 Halloween Event item.
The mischievous blood mage likes to have a little fun... 2016 Halloween Event exclusive item.
Inside the mega pumpkin you found: a bag full of all the evil pumpkins you've collected during the 2016 Halloween Event!
They thought it was impossible... to create a conveyor out of nothing but stale memes...
A terrible remote mine that grows weaker the longer it is powered.
The glorious Northern Lights grow powerful as they process the blessed energy of the sparkling coal.
A dangerous makeshift mine whose ores react violently when they come into contact with coal.
A towering furnace built for the biggest mines in the world.
An iron mine so large it puts the massive iron mine to shame.
A fairly small Iron Mine. Produces fairly valuable ore for its pathetic size. Found in the 2016 Giant Crate Black Friday artifact.
A device that harnesses the power of a nebula to move massive amounts of ore. Requires a Nebula Reciever. Replaces Ore Pulsars. 2016 Black Friday Artifact reward.
Receives ore from the Ore Nebula. 2016 Black Friday Artifact reward.
A friendly Martian who said that you can use his cool gravity coil as long as you let him crash at your base. Found inside the Planet Mars 2016 Black Friday artifact.
Imagine Santa is an ore. You wouldn't want a ton of Santa's in one chimney. Also, somewhat upgraded Santas are treated differently then... this analogy is falling apart. 2016 Holiday Exotic.
A yummy gingerbread house that turns ore into even yummier gum drops! 2016 Holiday Exotic.
The sweetest furnace in Miner's Haven! 2016 Holiday Collectible.
A mighty frozen upgrader that treats ores at every level with love. 2016 Holiday Exotic.
A festive upgrader to celebrate the best season of 2016. Doesn't count as an upgrade. New Year Exotic.
A colorful holiday conveyor to help you move your ore around faster. 2016 Holiday Collectible.
A festive wall decoration for your base. 2016 Holiday Collectable.
Nothing like a snow-covered tree to decorate your base with. 2016 Holiday Collectable.
A powerful machine used to collect Steel from Iron Ore. Click the button on the side to release Steel.
Part of the Innovation Event, fill an assembly unit with this ore to get a Hyper Ignition Fuse!
Fill the Assembly Unit with Hyper Ore to create a Hyper Ignition Fuse. Hyper Ore must go through an upgrader before being dumped.
An absurdly powerful mine when all eight of its ores are successfully captured. Remotely activated. Vanishes when you Rebirth.
The great parasite is greedy, and requires additional ore from your base to feast upon. Gains power as it feeds. Vanishes when you Rebirth.
Can fire burn? The flaming incendium mine fires flaming ore that must be put it to prevent it from being destroyed. Vanishes when you Rebirth.
The Utopian Refiner sees value in all ores. It offers a massive upgrade and sends you on your way. Vanishes when you Rebirth.
The Dystopian Refiner is harsh and crude, only upgrading ores by how much they "deserve." Vanishes when you Rebirth.
The super-powered catalyzed star can upgrade ores many times over before finally giving in.
An evil creation, the Dragonglass Blaster draws power from a remote source.
The puriest fusion of two great items. Clears all status effects and sends ore off with a large upgrade.
A split fusion of two of the worst mines in existance. The Diamond Breech Loader sinks below.
The simplest fusion, provides a huge upgrade for any ore that passes through.
The culmination of pure dedication. A machine unmatched by any other.
An incredibly powerful upgrader that requires ore be directly dropped into it.
An impressive trophy awarded to those few that had their submissions accepted into Miner's Haven.
Satellites are surprisingly cheap. Position your ore just right and a satellite will take care of the rest.
A simple gate that either allows ores to pass through or holds them in place.
A conveyor which seperates small and large ore into two seperate lanes.
An advanced conveyor that moves ore to its center. Useful for fine-point upgraders.
The fusion of precision and randomness, offers amazing possibilites but only for one ore at a time.
Send your un-upgraded ore through the enternal fracture for a heck of a ride. Only one ore can go at a time.
A strong upgrader which accepts raised conveyors from the sides. Prefers already well-upgraded ore.
A curved upgrader that can only upgrade ores once. The faster ore pass through it, the more it upgrades them.
An unstable furnace that can only be reached with a raised conveyor. Processes ore at six times their value.
A heavy furnace that quintiples the value of ore and awards decent research points. Difficult to get ore into.
Nothing heralds the coming of Spring quite like fireflies and home-made ore soup. Cook the best soup for potentially huge amounts of money. 2017 March Exotic
A fast limited-edition conveyor only for the Discord Verified.
Attaches to the side of raised conveyors and upgrades passing ore by 80% up to six times. Doesn't upgrade ore worth more than $1Qn.
A frightening path lays before you. Will you chose to continue down this path? Continuing down this path might not be a good idea... Who knows what else you could find. It could scar you for life.
troll2
Charges up energy as ore passes through and brusts all of its power into a single ore when it's full. Vanishes when you Rebirth.
Nothing like a pot of gold, a giant clover and a rainbow to decorate your lucky base with.
Follow the rainbow and you'll find the perfect place to put your ore! 2017 March Exotic.
A raised conveyor which passes under the light of a powerful ancient shrine. Doesn't count as an upgrade. 2017 March Exotic.
A special limited-edition mine obtained during the 2017 Saint Patrick's Day event. Ore upgrades itself based on how many lucky clovers you have.
The innocent golden flame of the clover blaster is slow-burning and upgrades ores once. Luckily, it does not explode. 2017 March Exotic.
What better what to show others your good fortune than with magic floating lucky clovers? 2017 St. Patrick's Day event item.
What do you get when you combine the latest in base-lighting technology and some clovers? 2017 St. Patrick's Day event item.
A handy board that displays information about the latest Miner's Haven update.
A mystical furnace that is charged by sparkling ore. Beams of light begin to appear as it is charged which can upgrade ore.
A divine conveyor on par with the Ultimate Sacrifice upgrader.
The Molten Forge melts ore until extremely durable versions of themselves. Once an ore is cast, it is affected much less by explosions.
Few things in this world are as tranquil as a sakura garden. Multiplier is higher the fewer ore enter.
The electrifying fusion of two incredibly powerful upgraders, this machine combines the purposes of the two that created it.
A special easter-themed gate that blows up any intruders.
Turns processed ore into shiny eggs that give a massive amount of money when picked up
April Fools! This snazzy mine was awarded for beating Miner's Haven 2.
The Frozen Eclipse judges ore similarly to the Gate from which it was created, but also heavily favors flaming ore.
Justice has achieved tranquility. Do whatever you want with your ore, and know that it will be rewarded.
A special egg-shaped upgrader given to you by the Easter Bunny during the 2017 Easter Event!
Aww, what a cute little easter bunny. I'm sure he would never hurt anyone...
Nothing is quite as imposing as a wall made out of real bunnies. Luckily this one isn't. 2017 Easter item.
The Diamond Egg is the Easter Bunny's most prized possession. Can upgrade ore multiple times, as long as there is time between upgrades.
A colorful easter-themed conveyor obtained during the 2017 Easter Event
A fancy and more consistant way of getting ore to hard-to-reach places.
A device which projects a dense ion field into the air. Any ore that passes through gets a substantial upgrade.
A conveyor which opens and closes to allow or block ore within a set time interval.
A fancy medieval gate which you can use to block people from entering your base.
Hoists ore onto a raised conveyor where it is then upgraded. Can only be used once.
A smaller version of the Portable Ore Advancer that can be attached to edges of your conveyors for bonus upgrades.
A fancy upgrader which upgrades and lowers ore from high places at the same time. Can be used several times.
You do a loop-de-loop and your ores are lookin good! Can upgrade ores many times as long as it is used in quick succession.
A high-up furnace which processes ore at an impressive five times their value, as long as you can get the ore into it.
A state-of-the-art research center that produces Research Points. Requires ore worth at least $1000
A raised version of the Portable Ore Advancer. Gives bonus upgrades for ore that it touches.
A massive hammer that will make your enemies rethink their life.
A terrifying sword that poisons anyone who gets cut by it.
Summer is all about fresh starts. Processes ore at an incredible rate for players who haven't Rebirthed or are in their first five lives.
An Iron Mine from a parallel universe where people are addicted to strange spinny things.
Converts a regular raised path to a miniature one.
A raised upgrader which adds value to ores based on what tax bracket they are in.
A large upgrader which offers huge upgrades to any ore large enough to reach the upgrade beam.
A monstrous fusion of Symmetrium and Scorpium. Drops one ore at a time which rapidly increases in value. Each ore starts off more powerful.
The power of the Illuminati took a fearsome furnace and made it even more powerful. Remote click to activate.
Harnesses the power of subatomic megacollisions to process unupgraded ore at incredible rates.
Provides several great upgrades for ores, provided they are on fire when they pass through.
troll
A statue built from the destroyed remains of The Ultimate Sacrifice. A constant reminder of everything you've acomplished.
Turns you into an adorable mini-you! Also makes you super fast. Does not stack with other infusers.
In this day and age, not having your own computer is pretty much the worst thing you can do to yourself.
Blow your enemies to bits with this terrifying rocket launcher!
Happy Birthday! An awesome conveyor to from Miner's Haven's 2nd Birthday!
Light up the night with an awesome strawberry birthday cake! MH 2nd Birthday Exotic.
The granddaddy of birthday cakes. Processes every other ore at a massive value. MH 2nd Birthday Exotic.
A small mine that packs a surprisingly big punch with its large emerald ore.
Onyx is such a rare material that it is difficult to consistantly mine the same amount. This mine is the closest it gets to perfection.
A nefarious upgrader apparently intentionally designed to create clogs. Can only be used on lightly-upgraded ore.
A small winding upgrader that'll increase ore value by 40% up to $10T.
Call upon the heavens to accept your ore at one hundred times their value.
Advanced technology allows this furnace to process ores at x20, but only while it's being manually activated. Acts like a basic furnace otherwise.
The purity of the Sakura Falls can withstand significantly larger volumes of ore.
A horrifying version of the dragon blaster that hits ores three times at once.
Unlocked version of Symmetrium that can produce many ores at once. Will break if more than one is placed down. Ores stop being upgraded if they lose their fire.
A more powerful spore that not only removes negative status effects but draws power from them.
An incredibly dense version of the morning star that upgrades much faster and has potential to upgrade twice if aimed correctly.
A superior version of the Catalyst. Upgrades ore by x6 like it's nothing.
A supercharged version of the Quantum Ore Cleaner.
Justice is swift... but it is forgiving. Processes more upgraded ore at a higher value.
An absurdly powerful furnace with a greater appetite than the Northern Lights.
Takes significantly longer to kick in but is much more powerful than the Astral Predicter when it does.
Changes the material of your entire tycoon's baseplate!
A wonderful machine that permanently changes the color of your baseplate.
A furnace made from technology older than humanity itself. Once incredibly powerful, its secret has been forgotten.
A mine made by an ancient civilization. There has to be more to it than meets the eye.
A trophy given to the decorated developers on the Roblox Dev Forums. Develop on!
A trophy awarded to Addicted Miners for winning the Research Points contest in 2017.
An infuser that ignites your character with a bright glow and increases your speed.
A device that blasts ore with so much freon that it becomes immune to fire for a minute.
A handy machine that paints any ore which pass through.
An over-complicated upgrader that can triple the value of ore up to three times.
A fiery hot upgrader which can only upgrade ores that are on fire. Can be used several times with no cash limit.
Warm cleansing spring water processes your ore at eight times their value... if you can reach it.
A raised upgrader that can be used once to increase the value of ore based on the amount of upgrade tags it has.
A parched shamble of bones that upgrades ore depending on how cold it is.
The guardian is weary of humans and will only reveal his true power when you are far far away.
A mystical spire that processes ores based on how few machine tags they have.
Pirate mercenaries continuously upgrade the value of the last ore that enters their cove.
An old and magical tree fuels this mysterious furnace. Processes ore and then teleports a copy to another furnace.
Awarded for helping a player Rebirth for their first time.
A terrifying creation that shouldn't exist. Ore from this mine start out heavily negated. 2017 Halloween Exotic.
An ancient dual upgrader that uses strange magic to upgrade ores. As such, it doesn't count as an upgrade. Does spooky things to ores. 2017 Halloween Exotic.
Decorate your base with this special spooky bat wall!
Give your character fancy particles with this unique limited-edition giver. 2017 Halloween Item
Haunt your character with cute little ghost particles. 2017 Halloween Item.
The hungry spirit haunts this shrine. It prefers ghostly and interesting ore, but it feasts on all. 2017 Halloween Exotic
A decorative altar awarded to those who obtained the berezaa Roblox toy in the mystical realm of real life.
Send your ore through the spooky pumpkin patch for a treat! 2017 Halloween Item.
A powerful but very scary mine. Don't look into it's eyes. 2017 Halloween Item.
A decorative supercomputer that'll impress all of the other miners.
The final gate draws on the power of the eclipse to do mysterious things to ores. Strange magic keeps ore contained within the gate.
An altar built upon the great sage king. Judges ore based on how many times it has been upgraded.
Sometimes you just gotta 😩
A mystical furnace powered the by the food of the gods. Draws great power from ore that has existed for a long time.
A powerful frozen refiner that literally turns ore into ice. 2017 Winter Exotic.
A magical forest sprung up from a pool of ambrosia. Grants massive multipliers to old ore.
Celebrate the snow with a friendly snowman decoration for your base. 2017 Winter Collectible.
An incredibly power-hungry furnace that will draw power from as much coal as you can possibly feed it.
A snowy conveyor that is covered in gifts. Moves ore real fast. 2017 Holiday item.
A magical conveyor built in the North Pole. Shuttles ore along incredibly quickly. 2017 Holiday item.
Show off your base's holiday spirit with this limited-edition festive potted tree! 2017 Holiday item.
Light up your base with holiday spirit! This festive flood light is sure to make your base feel cozy this winter. 2017 Holiday item.
The best part of the holidays? Candy canes! Show off your love for sugary festive treats with this unique character particle. 2017 Holiday item.
Secure your base with this sleek frosty fortress wall. 2017 Holiday item.
The center of any well-decorated holiday base. A lucious pine tree that's quite tastefully decorated. 2017 Holiday item.
The Cursed Pearl led you to this mysterious teleporter. Where does it lead? 2017 Artifact item.
A strange infuser that you found hidden within a Circus Tent. This'll turn you into a big boye (or grill). 2017 Artifact item.
A giant cannon from the Circus Tent that's still somehow functional. This baby'll shoot anything. 2017 Artifact Item.
A fancy infuser gifted to you by the Lone Frog. It can make you jump higher than the highest frog! 2017 Artifact item.
Want to be more like a frog? Well... now you can have frogs erupting from your chest! 2017 Artifact item.
If you're looking for an over-the-top contraption to light up your base at night... well it doesn't get much better than this.
This big bad wall will ensure absolutely no one breaks into your base. Featuring top-of-the-line KillBrick(TM) technology to stop intruders.
The ancient enlightened people hated randomness. This powerful evolved item builds upon the math of its predecessor.
Santa's upgraded his sleigh. He offers huge rewards for ores that have been good... and for good tycoon owners as well. 2017 Holiday Exotic.
A stunning snowglobe powered by an enternal cold magic. Any ores that pass underneath can recieve several large bonuses. 2017 Holiday Exotic.
A majestic tree that's powered by pure holiday spirit. Processes ore based on the owner's life. Multipliers are boosted by obscene amounts during the 2017 Holiday Event.
A special mine gifted to new Miner's Haven players during the 2017 Holiday Event!
A frozen mine that chills you to the core. Perhaps it has a deeper purpose...
A frozen mine that chills you to the core. Perhaps it has a deeper purpose...
A fiery mine that radiates an intense heat. There must be something else to this mine...
An energetic mine that pulses with incredible power. You can't help but wonder what this mine can do.
An experimental furnace hooked up to some sort of wireless power transmitter. Ores give off more power when they are upgraded.
One of the most powerful upgraders in the world. Rapidly click the button to grow an insane charge. The charge won't deplete unless it is neglected.
An advanced infuser which allows one to use two other infusers if activated correctly.
Uses rope to quickly and effortlessly lift ore up. Doubles the value of ore the first time they go up
A absurdly powerful flood light that easily illuminates an entire base. Available only during the Innovation Event.
A dark fungus that saps power from many ores in order to grant unthinkable power to a single ore.
A down-to-earth conveyor with lucky clovers growing on it to bless your ore.
Nothing like a golden clover wall to give you luck this St. Patrick's Day!
A lightweight machine from nature that quickly upgrades ores and sends them on their way.
An ancient rune believed to have been created by leprechauns. Grants endless value to the ores that pass through.
Decorate your base with a cute little doge plushie that also gives you good luck! Two birds with one stone.
Top leprechaun scientists got together to create this research furnace. Produces massive amounts of RP for whoever owns it.
Sometimes the end of a rainbow leads to a very powerful upgrader. 2018 St Patty's Day Exotic.
An upgrader from the digital realm that offers huge upgrades, just as long as it's placed far away from your mines.
An unthinkably powerful manual mine created by fringe science and lots of love.
A powerful upgrader that uses a hovering drone to upgrade every ore that passes through.
Secure your base and make it look pretty with this stylish seasonal easter wall.
Light up your base with this eggcelent easter-themed flood light!
Get into the easter spirit with this unique particle effect for your character.
Move your ore around in fashion with this fast and fashionable easter conveyor.
A doge plushie given to fools like you. Happy April Fool's!
Ha! Here you were thinking you were gonna get an awesome item and instead all you get is this actually pretty decent conveyor...  happy April Fool's!
A more advanced and compact version of the Tesla Resetter which also applies an upgrade based on the amount of tags it removes.
A device from the future that temporarily increases the effectiveness of other star-shaped items.
A beefy Flaming Schrodinger so unstable only a madman would use it.
A world renowned chef, Dogé is here to cook up his famous recipe for the 100M event.
An upgrader to celebrate 100 million visits. Check social media for a code to get this for free.
A cold shrine that appears to be sealing away a great and ancient power. If only there was a way to break the seal...
Nothing quite like a warm tropical breeze flowing through you. Sit back and relax, this upgrader's got you covered.
The god of fire hates complicated machinery and marvels of engineering. Please stop using them.
The coldest furnace in the world. Favors flaming ore.
An outrageously efficient machine that pumps out more diamond than you know what to do with.
A dark and mysterious furnace which draws power from its owner.
A behemoth of a machine whose incredibly dense ores react strangely to pulsars.
The angel grants a great blessing onto the purest ore without altering their state.
Light up your base with some serious style while celebrating Miner's Haven's birthday with this awesome light!
A 3rd Anniversary teleporter for a sweet-toothed owner. Requires the Shortcake Teleporter Sender.
Teleport your ores in tasty fruity style. Requires the Shortcake Teleporter Reciever.
A sleek and powerful anniversary conveyor that symbolizes how far we have come.
A sweet treat that moves ores faster than you can say delicious!
Tasty, simple and surprisingly useful, you can't go wrong with this chocolate conveyor.
A tasty third anniversary conveyor that'll make your base look real sweet.
Make your base a piece of cake with this handy decorative candle!
Needs a description, ber. ~ Locard
Needs a description, ber. ~ Locard
A sweet mine to celebrate the 3rd Miner's Haven Anniversary and to help you rebirth quickly!
Bash your way into some fun with this Iron Mine-themed birthday piñata!
A mouth-watering caramel cake to celebrate the 3rd Anniversary of Miner's Haven!
The granddaddy of all birthday cakes. You'd expect nothing less from the 3rd Anniversary event.
A mystical book that can draw great power from the knowledge on your base.
A potted decorative tree in the new Miner's Haven map style.
A table for miners who prefer to build their own mines.
Take a break from mining to grill up some hot dogs in the sun!
This item does not actually exist. It's just a joke.
A dynamic conveyor that can be placed at variable heights, even on top of other items!
A dynamic conveyor ramp that can be placed at variable heights, even on top of other items!
A dynamic conveyor that can be placed at variable heights, even on top of other items!
Keep out baddies and ghouls alike with this spooky haunted gate!
Move your ore at the speed of spicy with this spooky halloween conveyor!
The power of sweet sweet candy corn turned this already deadly zombie into a sugar-fueled killing machine!
The great pumpkin triples the value of most ore, but it significantly enhances ore that is associated with the pumpkin.
The SpookDemon uses engineered evil to forcefully trap spirits to its owner's advantage when powered. Halloween 2018 Exotic.
A magical upgrader from a faraway land. Gains power from the presence of Vesterians.
Harness the awesome power of wheat, tomato and cheddar to bring your base's research points to new heights.
Show the kids next door just how cheesy you can get with a giant cheese slice wall.
If the mining business doesn't work out, you can always try good ol' retail!
I'll be real with you, I've run out of ways to rationalize the existence of these monstrocities. It's a freaking pizza floodlight. Don't ask questions that don't need be to asked.
*NOM NOM* Pizza Doge, you're such a good boy! *MUNCH*
It is ancient pizza knowledge that rotating ore around a steamin' hot pie enchances any mineral's properties! Loves negated ingredients.
Blast your pizza with the force of a thousand pepperonis
The ultimate weapon, a machine that values ore at the price of pizza! Draws power from pizza-themed items in your base.
You really are rich huh?
The ultimate white dwarf!
An upgrader which shows of the ultimate results of your eternal dedecation. An upgrader that reigns supreme.
The result of space folding into itself, this mine was born. It warps the world around it in strange ways, but it's ores have incredible properties. Credits: ewitsfiddlestyx
An upgrader with so much power it warps the world around it, causing a cataclysm that traps it in eternal night. Credits: kinglucas990
PURE RADIATION SEEPED INTO ONE MACHINE. YOUR ORES WILL BE PAINTED GREEN AFTER THIS ITEM TOUCHES THEM.
Why did you make this? A mix between ancient power and rise from the dead. Some say this item might one day kill us all.
A massive breakthrough in technology for ores. This ore removes negative effects and even upgrades your ores massively! Just make sure to not cause a leakage.
Basic part used to move ores from droppers and other machines to furnaces. The Conveyor is a key part of every factory.
Obama's power is now in your hands.
The power of obama flows through this upgrader, feeding it with massive power
Just like having a third- No. Fourth eye. This item allows all seeing times. This item sends ores across time and space and into parallel universe's just to process them. Credits: xdflash0354
uC furnace
An item similar to the tesla resetter Credits: eroomad and lightofthecosmos
As items begin to diverge from reality, you think to yourself: "has it been worth it coming this far, and what is next?"
Use this to blast ores through your upgraders
A heavy conveyor which grants ore a small upgrader before launching it forward into the air.
A dynamic conveyor that can be placed at variable heights, even on top of other items!
This is the big brother of the Azure Refiner so rare theres only 500000000000000000 of them in the world!
Is this even supposed to exist?
An overpowered mine designed by a mad genius. Because of the odds, the item advanced on it's own like AI. It managed to make itself powered by it's predecessors.
An overpowered upgrader designed by a mad genius. Because of the odds, this upgrader became immortal and is used by the greatest miners all over the globe.
Who needs to wait for trash day when you can have this. This item truly shows how to get rid of your ores in style and money.
Imagine tossing your ores in the trash??? Put them inside this luxury truck and bring them to a much nicer place.
A fusion between two items that should never have collided. The further this upgrader is from the mine, the better.
This upgrader uses the power of emeralds and convert it into plasma to upgrade your ores,  richening your ores in the process.
This will unlock your ores true potential
This item will launch your ores up into the air and have it flying across the world. Just make sure to keep it's power nice and low, we don't want any rogue ores.
The deadliest spore

A powerful mine from the future that reacts oddly to upgrades and status effects. Resetting and some devices related to the overlords of this world seem to have okay effects, versus effects like sparkles and fire seem to have larger effects.
The power of the subspace is unknownly powerful, as it contains almost every single matter at once. But you can now using this superpower to fullfill.
Using The Fourth State Of Matter, Plasma, This Beast Drops Ores At A Incredible Rate With Incredible Value!

You have achieved something so dangerous yet so beautiful. Created during the collision between two parallel realities. This device of unfathomable ruin uses its mounted drills to eat through reality to feed itself. Almost like it's a sentient being that's aware of its surroundings.. Some say that the hellfire core in its center is the eye of god.
A severe bombarding approached as blasters from around the globe collided together and formed this abomination. It adds a massive boost to your ores...at a cost.

The Eternal Staircase. While it seems to fade away, one can reach the top. By offering it ore from a void corrupted mine, and having it experience the death of reality, the staircase will reveal an alternative path. Credits: glossyyou
Void follows no laws of physics. It is questionable whether or not using this is ethical, but its power is so immense, to pass this up is foolish. Credits: valphex

This machine is despicable beyond all other of it's kind, it harnesses power that is boundless beyond any other device seen, but looking at it makes you feel horrible inside for knowing what you have done. Credits: valphex

Someone once said that the void does not have any laws of physics. This item is the very evidence of that, with hundreds of stars compressed into such a small space you would expect a black hole. But instead, you get the very essence of the void that should not exist.
A furnace from the depths of hell, Hades himself fuels power to this despicable processor allowing it to process ores at incredible values, but at a price to other ores.
This marvellous item will protect your ores while you're away...well, that's if you can call processing them, protecting them, anyway.
Trolled
An over-hanging scanner that perfectly clones any ore that passes through
A small raised conveyor that allows loads to be dumped onto lower conveyors.
A long vertical ladder used to climb up walls and other tall structures.
This machine bombards things with neutrons and adds powerful and dense matter to them, turning them into a near invincible state. Credits: GreenMaxson_56789
This machine is an experiment from the future that was lost in time, that radiates pure quantum power. Credits: alvin22_daffa
This machine feasts off of ores kinetic energy and turns it into power for an upgrade. Creator: IcaruS_Five
This device uses the power of matter itself to supercharge the value of anything that it comes in contact with. Credits: titanchoo
So you though your little pillars were good, huh, this machine defames them and takes the place for #1 ultimate upgrader.
The final cultimation of your efforts, a device which harnesses the power of everything you have to create an incredible level of power.
credit: dintisepic
From depths deeper then those of the Hades' Horn, a furnace of incredible strength and fiery power lurks.
Credits: TheBlueMac55
A fancy Cube
The Supreme items that you have crafted have come together to create the apex of your journey thus far. Works as a Tesla Resetter.
The ultimate weapon that has been used in the war for over a centuries in the Eggverse, This one somehow managed to get into the haven.

The immense power of this blessed relic was tributed to the young girl who had the power that be able to rewind their age. The Quirk God had invented this goddess machine and now it be able to rewind ore's age more intense.
Millions of little shards compacted and compressed into 1 small one. Be careful with it!
A POWERFUL battery that could give a  mansion  inf electricity for at least 5 years!
As described.
A large converter-type ramp that is used to move ore up to a raised-ier conveyor.
Maybe this could be used for turns?
The Cube
What are the chances?

An un-worldly upgrader from the depths of hell itself. Many from shards of the devil's staff. This upgrader multiplies your ores immensely, as long as they actually hit the upgrader. Credits: xdflash0354
A powerful machine that can rewrite nature itself
The evolution of an item that can rewrite the stars. This item rings out with a portal above it. Just make sure it hits the upgrader. Credits: On the item.
Inputs A Vicious Malware That Buffs The Ores Value Up To 500x Aslong As It Is Far Away From The Ores Origin Point!
Every ore that passes through it recieves an upgrader higher than the one before. Just be careful not to use it too much, or it'll stay at a nought. Credits: xdflash0354
Oh boy this is gonna be good.
This is a beasty blaster. The two items that collided to create this magnificent blaster were never seen again. Who knows this items full potential?
By applying more machinery to the Yunium Mine, it seems it has completely liquidified the ore it produces, then solidifies it upon dropping. Credits: XxDuDiCudyXx
This beast of an upgrader has the power of 3,000 atomic bombs! It can be used 3 times, however has a chance of making ore radioactive if used more than once. Credits: Supz_Boi, Vonekorn, TheBlueMac55
This is the result of warping a standard Tsar Bomba into a standard upgrader,. Credits: MegomanFire
An artifact from the ORIGINAL race, let your ores feel the power of the TRUE precursor.
JUMP
Imagine a truck. Then imagine the truck hitting your ores. Then imagine that same truck being absorbed into your ore. That's basically what this upgrader is.
Overlord Extractor
The portal to the depth of the underworld, known as Nether. It's either terrifying to explore this hell. But we don't know what will this do to yours ores.

Once you obtained the ancient debris from the underworld, smelt them into a scrap which will be forged into a powerful material. it has a strong resistances to fire and lava. Now it's time for you to harvest the greatest material in the depth of the underworld.
Credits: Destified
A silly spirit found itself wandering far away from it's body! Unable to recapture it's remains, it possessed this mine. Some say it's power is...it's almost frightening.
This little upgrader truly wraps up your ores like a bow, while also shooting them through this upgrader like a bow and arrow.
This alien-type upgrader boosts your ores into hyperspace and uses the max powers to upgrade it.
Whether this item digitally upgrades or physically upgrades, nontheless it's a monster of an upgrader. This engine runs on pure horsepower! Credits: Hoshiisan
Same as vulcans grasp, but a bit more explosion-ey. Made By  Dragonfroot and Hoshiisan
Harnessing the power of the entire solar system, this upgrader will induce a great increase of value upon your ores. (Created by TheBlueMac55)
The Atomic Mine that was fused together and greated this abomination. This mine sucks in the atoms around it to gain it's power and shoot it out in a speedy ore glory.
upgrades ores
This item is retired.
This item is retired.
A flat-rate upgrader that can be used to increase the value of your ores.

After all of your hard work, through your pain and suffering, you have reached this point. What for? This item? It might be worth it or it might not be worth it. One thing is for sure: This item is the symbol of your hard work.
This machine is an experiment from the future that was lost in time, that radiates pure quantum power.
A conveyor that adds way more than $9.
You have had to go through unmeasureable lengths to get here. Why? I don't know. But here is your reward.
Through the realms you have traveled. And through time you have come. After your hard work and effort, it has come to this. What even is it? You may never know.
A dynamic conveyor that can be placed at variable heights, even on top of other items!
This mine creates spectral ore when you feed unupgraded  ore into its cauldron. It will mimic the ore it's fed and grant a bonus. Credits: TheGrand_Wiz

A hidden evil lies in the universe around us. It is unknown what it is, or if it is even an actual evil. Maybe if you dive deeper you might be able to find out more... But until then, it will remain a mystery

As you dive deeper into what is around you, you find out that some sort of cataclsymic event has happened in the past. A clash between powerful unknown forces. Diving deeper could unlock frightening secrets that should never be unlocked...

It seems like you have just uncovered something that should never have been touched, or even seen. It appears you have found out who those "beings" stronger than the zodiacs are. And the power that you found... could end the world.

Unknown to man, the legend of Taurus is real. Back in the past, many old legends had fallen, and Taurus is one of them. As one of the zodiacs, it had left a colossal impact on the world, as well as many relics. This, is one of those relics.

As you dive deeper into the past, you find that a lot more has been left behind from the previous "overlords" of the universe. It seems that items of infinite power may exist out there. As it currently stands, the only beings you can find remnants of, are the Zodiacs, but it is possible, that something or someone stronger than them existed before. As for what this relic you have obtained is called? It is rather unknown, as no one knows its origins.

It seems like it is too late... you have unleased the power of the ancient ones... A source of power that is unstoppable. Though it appears, they have left behind a little something for you, since after all, without you they would not have been re-awoken. The question remains: Will you use that power to bring them down, or will you be a coward?
AN EVEN MORE POWERFUL battery that could potentionally power up an entire city forever! Or be used to create more power.

Sometimes you wonder why you are still going. You have managed to already achieve heights that others can't even dream of. You have discovered secrets unknown, obtained items capable of destroying the universe, and released unbeatable foes. Even with this, you still continue, even though there is no end, you do not stop.
